original_title: Obama supports Newsom redistricting to counter Texas gerrymandering | Fox News
article_summary: California Governor Gavin Newsom aims to hold a special election to change the state's redistricting laws, a move intended to counter a partisan redistricting effort in Texas. Former President Barack Obama supports Newsom's approach, praising it as a responsible and measured response to a specific issue. California Republican lawmakers have vowed to oppose the changes.</s>
